item.title: Introduction to Nautilus
item.description: An overview of the Nautilus framework, its core features, and why it matters.

item.title: Introduction to Quanta
item.description:
Introduction to Quanta

Quanta is our proof-of-concept (POC) application demonstrating the capabilities of Nautilus in a real-world use case. It serves as a decentralized chat and file transfer platform, utilizing Nautilus’ networking stack to enable secure, peer-to-peer communication.

item.title: Architecture Summary
item.description: A high-level breakdown of Nautilus’ architecture, covering networking, identity, and storage systems.

item.title: Core Principles
item.description: A breakdown of Nautilus’ guiding principles: decentralization, security, modularity, and interoperability.
